definition: to dash/to move forward quickly/to bulge/to protrude/to break through/to rush out/sudden/Taiwan pr. [tu2]

sentences.english: The commandos blackened their faces with charcoal.
sentences.chinese: 那名突擊隊員用木炭把他的臉塗黑。

sentences.english: The commando blackened his face with charcoal.
sentences.chinese: 那名突擊隊員用木炭把他的臉塗黑。

sentences.english: The commandos attacked the outpost at dawn.
sentences.chinese: 突擊隊員於拂曉時襲擊了前哨基地。

sentences.english: The rangers joined other special troops to try to free Israelis taken hostage by several gunmen.
sentences.chinese: 特別突擊隊員和其他特種部隊成員試圖解救這些人質。

sentences.english: I used the air tubes to resemble the shape of the classic Stormtrooper’s helmet.
sentences.chinese: 我用呼吸管，來模仿原型中，典型的突擊隊員的頭盔。

sentences.english: Sporadic gunshots could be heard outside as commandos entered the hotels.
sentences.chinese: 在突擊隊員衝入酒店的時候，可以聽到零星槍聲。
